japrc2017.io

Interface ISimulationLoader


  • public interface ISimulationLoader
    A ISimulationLoader is an object that allows to load a simulation from a source (text file or other). A ISimulation object can read the content of the loader via the methods nextAirport() and nextTraffic(). An object such as a ISimulation should iterate through all the IAirport in the loader using the method nextAirport(), and must check beforehand if such an element exists using the method hasNextAirport(). Similarly, the object should iterate through all the Traffic in the loader using the method nextTraffic(), and must check beforehand if such an element exists using the method hasNextTraffic().
    Author:
    Lilian

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean hasNextAiport() 
      boolean hasNextTraffic() 
      IAirport nextAirport() 
      Traffic nextTraffic() 

    • Method Detail

      • hasNextAiport

        boolean hasNextAiport()
        Returns:
        true if the simulation loader contains another IAirport entry, false otherwise

      • hasNextTraffic

        boolean hasNextTraffic()
        Returns:
        true if the simulation loader contains another Traffic entry, false otherwise

      • nextAirport

        IAirport nextAirport()
        Returns:
        the next IAirport from the loader
        Throws:
        java.util.NoSuchElementException - if there is no remaining IAirport

      • nextTraffic

        Traffic nextTraffic()
        Returns:
        the next Traffic from the loader
        Throws:
        java.util.NoSuchElementException - if there is no remaining Traffic
